mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `coupon` ( `temp_id`, `batch_id`, `batch_no`, `coupon_code`, `active_time`, `valid_length`, `valid_length_unit`, `status`, `mem_no`, `order_no`, `name`, `abstract_txt`, `coupon_type`, `handler`, `max_discount`, `cond_amount`, `real_discount`, `discount`, `discount_rate`, `restricted`, `support_cost_types`, `support_cities`, `support_car_brand`, `support_overlap`, `conflict_mode`, `conflict_temp_id`, `overlap_temp_id`, `valid_day`, `valid_use_begin_time`, `valid_use_end_time`, `valid_begin_time`, `valid_end_time`, `mem_has_read`, `create_time`, `use_time`, `rent_min_day`, `rent_max_day`, `day_cond_amount`, `day_discount`, `double_cond_amount`, `double_discount`, `day_discount_rate`, `support_car_tags`, `double_discount_rate`, `day_max_discount`, `valid_use_day` ) VALUES ( '180', '4956', '$1$测试工具发券', #{random}, '2018-07-19 16:45:57', '60', '1', '0', #{memNo}, '715928808081', '测试工具发券', '本优惠券有效期为60天', '1', '123', NULL, '0', '0', '100', NULL, '0', '1', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, '0', '2015-01-01', '2099-01-01', '2018-07-19', '2029-09-17', '1', '2018-07-19 16:45:57', '2018-08-08 10:34:48', '-1', '999999', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, '11111111' ) ;
